message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.DS 

The paper focuses on addressing security and scalability challenges in IoT and edge computing through the use of blockchain and smart contracts. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the use of edge computing, which falls under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The use of smart contracts and blockchain also falls under cs.SE (Software Engineering) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
